snippet: The authorities said shifting ice sheets in France’s Mont Blanc mountain range apparently caused an avalanche that killed at least nine climbers.
abstract: Avalanche in France's Mont Blanc mountain range sweeps at least nine European climbers to their death and at least 11 others are injured.
lead_paragraph: The authorities said shifting ice sheets in France’s Mont Blanc mountain range apparently caused an avalanche that killed at least nine climbers.

headline.main: Avalanche Kills at Least 9 Climbers in France’s Mont Blanc Mountain Range
headline.print_headline: Avalanche Kills at Least 9 Climbers in France’s Mont Blanc Mountain Range
